Vinakinesis.title: Vinakinesis
Vinakinesis.Name: [color=#00a000]Vinakinesis[/color]
Vinakinesis.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]attack[/color] / [color=#ff8030]hit[/color]: 
    
     apply 5 [color=#60af20]Entangle[/color] to the target

On [color=#ffff50]you or an ally applying[/color] [color=#60af20]Entangle[/color]: 

     deal [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 30 * skill level[/color]

Chuluma.title: Chuluma
Chuluma.Name: [color=#00a000]Piercing Vines[/color]
Chuluma.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color]: 
    
     apply [color=#60af20]Entangle[/color] to 2 enemies in a 3 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Entangle applied = 3 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ff8030]hit[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] target has [color=#60af20]Entangle[/color]: 

     deal [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] damage to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 5 * skill level * target Entangle stacks[/color]

MasterEntangle.title: MasterEntangle
MasterEntangle.Name: [color=#00a000]Master Entangle[/color]
MasterEntangle.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]being dealt[/color] damage: 
    
     apply [color=#60af20]Entangle[/color] to yourself and adjacent enemies

[color=#a0a0a0]Entangle applied = skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]being attacked[/color]:

     deal [color=#af8f50]Pierce[/color] damage to the attacker

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = skill level * stacks of Entangle on self[/color]

You [color=#ffff50]no longer take damage[/color] from any source triggered by [color=#60af20]Entangle[/color] and it is no longer removed with [color=#c050ff]Willpower[/color]

AmplifiedHealing.title: AmplifiedHealing
AmplifiedHealing.Name: [color=#00a000]Life Chant[/color]
AmplifiedHealing.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     [color=#ff8080]+50 max Life[/color]
     [color=#50ff50]+5 all healing[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] / [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] enemies live: 

     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] yourself

[color=#c0c0c0]Heal = 50 * skill level[/color]

Invigoration.title: Invigoration
Invigoration.Name: [color=#00a000]Invigoration[/color]
Invigoration.Description:
Allies become [color=#ffff50]immune[/color] to damage dealt by you

Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color], to [color=#ffff50]summoned allies[/color]:

     [color=#ff8080]+30% Life[/color]
     [color=#ff8080]+50 Life[/color]
     [color=#5050ff]+50 Armor[/color]
     [color=#ffff50]+25%[/color] [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] / [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] resistance

ErtHunab.title: ErtHunab
ErtHunab.Name: [color=#00a000]Arboromancy[/color]
ErtHunab.Description:
On an allied [color=#00a000]Plant[/color] [color=#ffff50]attacking an enemy[/color]: 

     you apply [color=#60af20]Entangle[/color] to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Entangle applied = skill level[/color]

On [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#00a000]Creeper[/color] [color=#c050ff]familiars[/color]
     allied [color=#00a000]Plants[/color] gain [color=#20ff20]+5 Speed[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = skill level

Creepers are large motionless plants that entangle enemies

Summoned Familiars are not limited by your Willpower[/color]

GroveCult.title: GroveCult
GroveCult.Name: [color=#00a000]Grove Cult[/color]
GroveCult.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]summon[/color]: 

     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Heal = 10 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#00a000]Grove Priests[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = 3 * skill level

Grove Priests are loyal acolytes of your personal cult that attack with ranged thorns and cast Mend

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

Overgrowth.title: Overgrowth
Overgrowth.Name: [color=#00a000]Overgrowth[/color]
Overgrowth.Description:
Allied [color=#c050ff]familiars[/color] are now treated as [color=#00a000]Plants[/color] [color=#707070]when summoned[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] / [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] enemies live:

     summon a number of [color=#20af20]Gisas[/color]
     allied [color=#00a000]Plants[/color] gain [color=#ff8080]+5% max Life[/color] [color=#707070]* skill level[/color] [color=#707070]+1000 max[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = skill level

Gisas are leaf-born soldiers that entangle enemies[/color]

On an allied [color=#00a000]Plant[/color] [color=#ffff50]being attacked[/color]: 

     you apply [color=#60af20]Entangle[/color] to the attacker

[color=#a0a0a0]Entangle applied = skill level[/color]

Vineform.title: Vineform
Vineform.Name: [color=#00a000]Vineform[/color]
Vineform.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]summon[/color]: 

     apply [color=#60af20]Vineform[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Vineform applied = 2 * skill level

When applied, this effect replaces and inherits the stacks of any current transformation[/color]

Azar.title: Azar
Azar.Name: [color=#ff8000]Pyrokinesis[/color]
Azar.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]adjacent hit[/color]: 

     deal [color=#ff8000]Fire[/color] damage to all adjacent units

On [color=#ff8030]non-adjacent hit[/color]: 
     
     deal [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] damage in a 1 tile area at the target

On [color=#ffff50]kill[/color]: 

     deal [color=#ff8000]Fire[/color] damage to all units in a 2 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 30 * skill level[/color]

Pyromancy.title: Pyromancy
Pyromancy.Name: [color=#ff8000]Pyromancy[/color]
Pyromancy.Description:
On [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color] / [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color]: 

     deal [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] damage to all units in a 2 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 50 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#ff8000]Fire[/color] damage: 

     apply [color=#ff7000]Scorch[/color] to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Scorch applied = 3 * skill level[/color]

Increase all [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] / [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] / [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage by the stacks of [color=#ff7000]Scorch[/color] on the target [color=#707070]* skill level[/color]

Shamsar.title: Shamsar
Shamsar.Name: [color=#ff8000]Shamsar[/color]
Shamsar.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     [color=#ff8030]+50 Hit[/color]
     [color=#ffa050]+50 Accuracy[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#af8f50]Slash[/color] / [color=#af8f50]Blunt[/color] damage: 

     deal [color=#ff8000]Fire[/color] damage to 2 adjacent enemies

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 150 * skill level[/color]

FireHealing.title: FireHealing
FireHealing.Name: [color=#ff8000]Fire Healing[/color]
FireHealing.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]hit[/color]: 

     apply [color=#ff7000]Scorch[/color] to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Scorch applied = 2 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#ff8000]Fire[/color] damage: 

     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Heal = 2 * skill level[/color]

FrenziedChant.title: FrenziedChant
FrenziedChant.Name: [color=#ff8000]Frenzied Chant[/color]
FrenziedChant.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] / [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] enemies live:

     deal 25 [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage to yourself
     apply [color=#ff7000]Inflame[/color] to yourself
     perform a number of [color=#ff8030]extra attacks[/color] against an adjacent enemy

[color=#a0a0a0]Self-damage is unaffected by all resistance / increase[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Inflame applied = 5 * skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks = skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks use your Main-hand weapon and do not count as an "initial attack"[/color]

Immolation.title: Immolation
Immolation.Name: [color=#ff8000]Immolation[/color]
Immolation.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color]: 

     apply [color=#ff7000]Scorch[/color] to adjacent enemies

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] / [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] / [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage:

     increase it by the stacks of [color=#ff7000]Scorch[/color] on the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Scorch applied = 10 * skill level[/color]

MasterScorch.title: MasterScorch
MasterScorch.Name: [color=#ff8000]Master Scorch[/color]
MasterScorch.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]being attacked[/color]: 

     deal [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] damage to the attacker and to adjacent units
     apply [color=#ff7000]Scorch[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Scorch applied = skill level

Damage = 5 * skill level * stacks of Scorch on self[/color]

You [color=#ffff50]no longer take damage[/color] from any source triggered by [color=#ff7000]Scorch[/color] and it is no longer removed with [color=#c050ff]Willpower[/color]

Zahan.title: Zahan
Zahan.Name: [color=#ff8000]Fire Chant[/color]
Zahan.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] / [color=#ffff50]stand stil[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] enemies live: 

     apply [color=#ff8000]Inflame[/color] to yourself and all adjacent allies

[color=#a0a0a0]Inflame applied = 4 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#ff8000]Afrits[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = 4 * skill level

Afrits are long-ranged fire elementals with a Burning Aura

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

SummonRedDragon.title: SummonRedDragon
SummonRedDragon.Name: [color=#ff8000]Fire Familiar[/color]
SummonRedDragon.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     summon a [color=#ff8000]Red Dragon[/color] [color=#c050ff]familiar[/color]
     [color=#707070]Life / Hit multiplied by skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]The Red Dragon is a monstrous beast that spits fire at enemies

Summoned Familiars are not limited by your Willpower[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]apply[/color] [color=#ff8000]Inflame[/color]:

     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] the [color=#ff8000]Red Dragon[/color] for 20 [color=#707070]* skill level[/color]
     a random ally gains [color=#ff8030]+30 Hit[/color] [color=#707070]* skill level[/color]

On [color=#ff8030]attack[/color]: 

     apply [color=#ff8000]Inflame[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Inflame applied = 4 * skill level[/color]

FireKnight.title: FireKnight
FireKnight.Name: [color=#ff8000]Order of Flame[/color]
FireKnight.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]level[/color], to [color=#ffff50]summoned allies[/color]:

     [color=#ffff50]+25%[/color] [color=#ff8000]Fire[/color] resistance

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#ff8000]Fire Knights[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = 2 * Level

Fire Knights are zealous warriors from the domain of fire. They heal and gain Hit when you attack.[/color]

FlameCult.title: FlameCult
FlameCult.Name: [color=#ff8000]Flame Cult[/color]
FlameCult.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]summon[/color]: 

     deal [color=#ff8000]Fire[/color] damage in a path to 1 enemy in a 4 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 40 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#ff8000]Flame Priests[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = 3 * skill level

Fire Priests are loyal acolytes of your personal cult that attack with ranged Fire

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

Wormform.title: Wormform
Wormform.Name: [color=#ffb000]Newtform[/color]
Wormform.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] over 100 [color=#ff8000]Fire[/color] damage: 

     apply [color=#ff8000]Newtform[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Newtform applied = 2 * skill level

When applied, this effect replaces and inherits the stacks of any current transformation[/color]

Elding.title: Elding
Elding.Name: [color=#0060ff]Electrokinesis[/color]
Elding.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]adjacent hit[/color]: 

     deal [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage in a straight line starting from your position

On [color=#ff8030]non-adjacent hit[/color]: 

     deal [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage in a path to the target

On [color=#ffff50]dodge[/color]: 

     deal [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage in a path to all enemies in a 3 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 40 * skill level[/color]

Kerjata.title: Kerjata
Kerjata.Name: [color=#0060ff]Electromancy[/color]
Kerjata.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]:

     [color=#20ff20]+5 Speed[/color]
     [color=#50ff50]-1[/color] [color=#ff0000]Inflexibility[/color]

On [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color] / [color=#ffff50]step[/color]: 

     deal [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage in a path to 1 enemy in a 2 tile range [color=#707070]repeat per skill level[/color]    
     apply [color=#0060ff]Charge[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = Speed * skill level

Charge applied = skill level[/color]

Skera.title: Skera
Skera.Name: [color=#0060ff]Skera[/color]
Skera.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     [color=#ffa050]+50 Accuracy[/color]
     [color=#50ffff]+30 Dodge[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#af8f50]Pierce[/color] / [color=#af8f50]Slash[/color] damage to an enemy: 

     deal [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage in a path to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 50 * skill level[/color]

Ikami.title: Ikami
Ikami.Name: [color=#0060ff]Master Charge[/color]
Ikami.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]hit[/color]:

     apply [color=#0060ff]Charge[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Charge applied = skill level[/color]

Gain [color=#20ff20]+1 Speed[/color] per stack of [color=#0060ff]Charge[/color] on self

Chamakana.title: Chamakana
Chamakana.Name: [color=#0060ff]Chamakana[/color]
Chamakana.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] / [color=#af8f50]Pierce[/color] / [color=#af8f50]Slash[/color] damage to an enemy with 100% [color=#ff8080]Life[/color]:

      perform a number of 100 damage [color=#ff8030]Hits[/color] against the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Number of hits = skill level

This hit bypasses all defense and uses your Main-hand damage type[/color]

Herja.title: Herja
Herja.Name: [color=#0060ff]Herja[/color]
Herja.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]initial attack[/color]:

     perform a number of [color=#ff8030]extra attacks[/color] against the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks = skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks use your Main-hand weapon and do not count as an "initial attack"[/color]

On [color=#ff8030]attack[/color]:

      deal [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage in a path to the furthest enemy

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 50 * skill level[/color]

FulminantCult.title: FulminantCult
FulminantCult.Name: [color=#0060ff]Fulminant Cult[/color]
FulminantCult.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]summon[/color]:

     apply [color=#0060ff]Charge[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Charge applied = skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#0060ff]Fulminant Priests[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = 3 * skill level

Fulminant Priests are loyal acolytes of your personal cult that attack with ranged Lightning

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

Stormcalling.title: Stormcalling
Stormcalling.Name: [color=#0060ff]Stormcalling[/color]
Stormcalling.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]attack[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#0060ff]Ball Lightnings[/color] at random tiles

[color=#a0a0a0] Amount summoned = 2 * skill level

Ball Lightnings are fragile bursts of elemental intention

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

Sparkform.title: Sparkform
Sparkform.Name: [color=#0060ff]Sparkform[/color]
Sparkform.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     apply [color=#0060ff]Sparkform[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Sparkform applied = 10 * skill level

When applied, this effect replaces and inherits the stacks of any current transformation[/color]

Psychokinesis.title: Psychokinesis
Psychokinesis.Name: [color=#ffaf30]Psychokinesis[/color]
Psychokinesis.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color] / [color=#ff8030]hit[/color]:

     deal [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage in a path to 1 enemy in a 5 tile range
     apply [color=#ffaf30]Repulsion[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 30 * skill level

Repulsion applied = 2 * skill level[/color]

Psiblade.title: Psiblade
Psiblade.Name: [color=#ffaf30]Psiblade[/color]
Psiblade.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] Main-hand is a [color=#ffff50]bare fist[/color]:

     [color=#ffff50]+1[/color] attack range

On [color=#ff8030]hit[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] [color=#ffff50]bare fist[/color]:

     deal [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage to the target
     deal [color=#af8f50]Slash[/color] damage to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 50 * skill level[/color]

MindKnight.title: MindKnight
MindKnight.Name: [color=#ffaf30]Mindfighter[/color]
MindKnight.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 
    
     [color=#50ffff]+10 Dodge[/color]
     [color=#5050ff]+10 Armor[/color]
     [color=#5050ff]+15 Block[/color]
     [color=#c0c0c0]+3% chance to block[/color]

On [color=#ff8030]adjacent attack[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] [color=#ffff50]two-handing[/color]:
    
     apply [color=#ffaf30]Repulsion[/color] to yourself
     deal [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage in a line starting from the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Repulsion applied = skill level

Damage = 50 * skill level[/color]

MasterRepulsion.title: MasterRepulsion
MasterRepulsion.Name: [color=#ffaf30]Master Repulsion[/color]
MasterRepulsion.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]:  

     [color=#ffff50]+1 stacks[/color] of any [color=#ffaf30]Repulsion[/color] applied by you

On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color]:

     apply [color=#ffaf30]Repulsion[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Repulsion applied = 5% of Repulsion on self * skill level[/color]

Gain [color=#5050ff]+1 Block[/color] per stack of [color=#ffaf30]Repulsion[/color] on self

Increase all [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] / [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage by the stacks of [color=#ffaf30]Repulsion[/color] on yourself

AmplifyPain.title: AmplifyPain
AmplifyPain.Name: [color=#ffaf30]Amplify Pain[/color]
AmplifyPain.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]you or an ally being dealt damage by an enemy[/color]:
    
     you deal 5 [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage to yourself
     repeat with [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] damage

[color=#a0a0a0]Self-damage is unaffected by resistance / increase[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]self-damage[/color]:

     deal [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage to all enemies in a 2 tile range
     apply [color=#ffaf30]Repulsion[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 20 * skill level

Repulsion applied = skill level[/color]

PsychicRetort.title: PsychicRetort
PsychicRetort.Name: [color=#ffaf30]Psychic Retort[/color]
PsychicRetort.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]being hit[/color]:
    
     perform 2 [color=#ff8030]Hits[/color] against the attacker

[color=#a0a0a0]Hit damage = stacks of Repulsion on self

This hit bypasses all defense and uses your Main-hand damage type[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]being attacked[/color]:

      apply [color=#ffaf30]Repulsion[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Repulsion applied = 5 * skill level[/color]

Psychomorphism.title: Psychomorphism
Psychomorphism.Name: [color=#ffaf30]Projective Link[/color]
Psychomorphism.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]an ally hitting an enemy[/color]:

     you perform a number of 15 damage [color=#ff8030]Hits[/color] against the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Number of hits = skill level

This hit bypasses all defense and uses your Main-hand damage type[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]an ally being hit by an enemy[/color]: 

     that enemy performs a 15 damage [color=#ff8030]Hit[/color] against you

MassMind.title: MassMind
MassMind.Name: [color=#ffaf30]Mass Mind[/color]
MassMind.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] / [color=#78bca4]divine intervention[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] enemies live:
    
     deal [color=#ffaf30]Psychic[/color] damage to all enemies in a 1+ tile range
     summon a number of [color=#ffaf30]Glinting Blades[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = (Number of allies +1) * 5 * skill level

Range / Summoned amount = skill level

Glinting Blades are flying swords conjured from the mind-warren

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Divine intervention occurs when your deity saves you from death; must have at least one fully-charged prayer[/color]

MirrorImage.title: MirrorImage
MirrorImage.Name: [color=#ffaf30]Mirror Image[/color]
MirrorImage.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     [color=#50ffff]+100 Dodge[/color]
     [color=#50ff50]-1[/color] [color=#ff0000]Inflexibility[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]dodge[/color]:

     summon a number of [color=#ffaf30]Psychomorphs[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = skill level

Psychomorphs are ethereal projections of your weapon

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

PoisonPalm.title: PoisonPalm
PoisonPalm.Name: [color=#70ff00]Toxokinesis[/color]
PoisonPalm.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]attack[/color]: 

     deal [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to the target

On [color=#ff8030]hit[/color]: 

     apply 5 [color=#70ff00]Sickness[/color] to the target

On [color=#ffff50]apply[/color] [color=#70ff00]Sickness[/color]: 

     deal [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to the target and to 3 adjacent enemies

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 30 * skill level[/color]

PoisonSkin.title: PoisonSkin
PoisonSkin.Name: [color=#70ff00]Poison Skin[/color]
PoisonSkin.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]being attacked[/color]:

     apply [color=#70ff00]Sickness[/color] to the attacking unit

[color=#a0a0a0]Sickness applied = 2 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage:

     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Heal = 2 * skill level[/color]

Morbumancy.title: Morbumancy
Morbumancy.Name: [color=#70ff00]Morbumancy[/color]
Morbumancy.Description:
On [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color] / [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color], per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     apply 10 [color=#70ff00]Sickness[/color] to 1 enemy in a 3 tile range

Increase all [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] / [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage by the stacks of [color=#70ff00]Sickness[/color] on the target [color=#707070]* skill level[/color]

Plaguedrinking.title: Plaguedrinking
Plaguedrinking.Name: [color=#80af00]Plague Chant[/color]
Plaguedrinking.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] / [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] enemies live:
     
     deal 25 [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to yourself
     apply [color=#80af00]Plague[/color] to all enemies

[color=#a0a0a0]Self-damage is unaffected by all resistance / increase[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]an ally attacking an enemy[/color]: 

     apply [color=#80af00]Plague[/color] to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Plague applied = 2 * skill level[/color]

Slime.title: Slime
Slime.Name: [color=#ffb000]Acidify[/color]
Slime.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]attack[/color] / [color=#ffff50]summon[/color]: 

     apply [color=#ffb000]Corrosion[/color] to 3 enemies in a 3 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Corrosion applied = 5 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#78bca4]divine intervention[/color]:

     deal [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to all enemies with [color=#ffb000]Corrosion[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 10 * skill level * target Corrosion stacks[/color]

Increase all [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] / [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] damage by the stacks of [color=#ffb000]Corrosion[/color] on the target

BurningOoze.title: BurningOoze
BurningOoze.Name: [color=#70ff00]Burning Ooze[/color]
BurningOoze.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]an ally attacking an enemy[/color]: 

     you deal [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] and [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 10 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#70ff00]Oozes[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = skill level

Oozes are writhing elemental masses that smother enemies with sickness and corrosion

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

Oozemancy.title: Oozemancy
Oozemancy.Name: [color=#70ff00]Oozemancy[/color]
Oozemancy.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]summon[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] at least 1 [color=#70ff00]Ooze[/color] is alive:

     deal [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to 3 enemies in a 2 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 20 * number of allied Oozes[/color]

On [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#70ff00]Oozes[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = skill level

Oozes are writhing elemental masses that smother enemies with sickness and corrosion

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

PoisonFamiliar.title: PoisonFamiliar
PoisonFamiliar.Name: [color=#70ff00]Poison Familiar[/color]
PoisonFamiliar.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     summon a [color=#70ff00]Tsuchigumo[/color] [color=#c050ff]familiar[/color]
     [color=#707070]Life / Hit multiplied by skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]The Tsuchigumo is a cunning spider that sickens enemies with its piercing fangs

Summoned Familiars are not limited by your Willpower[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]apply[/color] [color=#70ff00]Sickness[/color] / [color=#ffb000]Corrosion[/color]:

     a random ally gains [color=#50ffff]+30 Dodge[/color] [color=#707070]* skill level[/color]
     the [color=#70ff00]Tsuchigumo[/color] deals [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage equal to its [color=#ff8030]Hit[/color] [color=#707070]to an enemy adjacent to it, repeat per skill level[/color]

Snakeform.title: Snakeform
Snakeform.Name: [color=#70ff00]Snakeform[/color]
Snakeform.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]apply[/color] [color=#70ff00]Sickness[/color]: 

     apply [color=#40af00]Snakeform[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Snakeform applied = 2 * skill level

When applied, this effect replaces and inherits the stacks of any current transformation[/color]

FumeB.title: FumeB
FumeB.Name: [color=#70ff00]Fume[/color]
FumeB.Description:
[color=#70ff00]{Poison}[/color]

Whenever you [color=#ffff50]apply[/color] [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] to an enemy, deal [color=#70ff00]Poison[/color] damage to all units in a 2 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = (20 * (WIL/5) * Level) / Inflex[/color]

Ara.title: Ara
Ara.Name: [color=#8030af]Astrokinesis[/color]
Ara.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]attack[/color]: 

     deal [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage to the target

On [color=#ff8030]hit[/color]: 

     deal [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage in a path to 2 enemies at any range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 30 * skill level[/color]

Weirding.title: Weirding
Weirding.Name: [color=#8030af]Cosmic Shield[/color]
Weirding.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]:  

     [color=#5050ff]+25 Block[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]block[/color]: 

     deal [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage in a path to 1 enemy in a 4 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 75 * skill level[/color]

AstralTechnique.title: AstralTechnique
AstralTechnique.Name: [color=#8030af]Asi Malak[/color]
AstralTechnique.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] [color=#ffff50]two-handing[/color] weapon:

     [color=#ffff50]+1[/color] attack range

On [color=#ff8030]hit[/color]: 

     deal [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage to 3 enemies at any range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 100 * skill level[/color]

Magus.title: Magus
Magus.Name: [color=#8030af]Projection[/color]
Magus.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color], per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]:

     perform a [color=#ff8030]Hit[/color] against 1 enemy in a 4 tile range

Hit damage = 20 * skill level

[color=#a0a0a0]This hit bypasses all defense and uses your Main-hand damage type[/color]

On [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] [color=#00ff00]unencumbered[/color] and [color=#00ff00]flexible[/color]:

     perform all "[color=#ffff50]stand still[/color]" actions

Astrostoicism.title: Astrostoicism
Astrostoicism.Name: [color=#8030af]Astrostoicism[/color]
Astrostoicism.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]being dealt damage by an enemy[/color]: 

     apply [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] to yourself
     [color=#a030b0]teleport[/color] the attacker to a random tile
     the attacker applies 5 [color=#a030b0]Stasis[/color] to itself

[color=#a0a0a0]Poise applied = 3 * skill level[/color]

Astrohunting.title: Astrohunting
Astrohunting.Name: [color=#8030af]Astrohunting[/color]
Astrohunting.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]:

     [color=#50ff50]-1[/color] [color=#ff0000]Inflexibility[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color]:

     [color=#a030b0]teleport[/color] to the closest enemy
     apply 5 [color=#a030b0]Stasis[/color] to yourself
     deal [color=#0060ff]Lightning[/color] damage to adjacent units
     repeat with [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 100 * skill level[/color]

Also perform these actions on [color=#ffff50]killing an enemy[/color] [color=#ff8080]if[/color] you have [color=#ffff50]no armor equipped[/color]

AstralSeeking.title: AstralSeeking
AstralSeeking.Name: [color=#8030af]Master Teleport[/color]
AstralSeeking.Description:
On [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color]: 

     [color=#a030b0]teleport[/color] to a random tile
     apply 5 [color=#a030b0]Stasis[/color] to yourself

On self / any unit [color=#a030b0]teleport[/color]: 

     apply [color=#8030af]Meditate[/color] to yourself
     deal [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage to 1 enemy at any range

[color=#a0a0a0]Meditate applied = 2 * skill level

Damage = 25 * skill level[/color]

[color=#707070]Effect[/color][color=#c0c0c0]
[color=#a030b0]Stasis:[/color] [color=#ff5050]prevents[/color] teleportation

[color=#ff5050]1 removed[/color] on [color=#ffff50]being attacked[/color][/color]

Innervation.title: Innervation
Innervation.Name: [color=#8030af]Innervation[/color]
Innervation.Description:
Allies become [color=#ffff50]immune[/color] to damage dealt by you

Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color], to [color=#ffff50]summoned allies[/color]:

     [color=#20ff20]+3 Speed[/color] 
     [color=#ffa050]+30 Accuracy[/color]
     [color=#ff8030]+50 Hit[/color]

Shimmergang.title: Shimmergang
Shimmergang.Name: [color=#8030af]Shimmergang[/color]
Shimmergang.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color] / [color=#a030b0]teleportation[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#8030af]Blinksnakes[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount (entrance / learn) = 3 * skill level

Summoned amount (teleport) = skill level

Blinksnakes are blurred reptiles conjured from starlight that teleport themselves and enemy units

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

StarCult.title: StarCult
StarCult.Name: [color=#8030af]Star Cult[/color]
StarCult.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]summon[/color]: 

     apply [color=#8030af]Meditate[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Meditate applied = skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#8030af]Star Priests[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = 3 * skill level

Star Priests are loyal acolytes of your personal cult that attack with ranged Astral damage

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

AstralKnight.title: AstralKnight
AstralKnight.Name: [color=#8030af]Order of the Stars[/color]
AstralKnight.Description:
Increase the [color=#50ffff]Defense[/color], [color=#5050ff]Block[/color] and [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] resistance of [color=#ffff50]summoned allies[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#8030af]Astral Knights[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = Level

Sumoned Block increase = 80 * Level

Summoned resist and Defense dice increase = 10 * Level

Astral Knights are powerful warriors able to teleport enemies[/color]

Tenacity.title: Tenacity
Tenacity.Name: [color=#af8f50]Heavyweight[/color]
Tenacity.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     [color=#5050ff]+40 Armor[/color]
     [color=#5050ff]+20% Armor[/color] from each worn armor
     [color=#ff0000]+2 Encumbrance[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]shrug off[/color]: 
     
     deal [color=#af8f50]Blunt[/color] damage to an adjacent enemy

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = Encumbrance * skill level[/color]

Murmillo.title: Murmillo
Murmillo.Name: [color=#af8f50]Guard[/color]
Murmillo.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]:

     [color=#5050ff]+60 Block[/color]
     [color=#5050ff]+30% Block[/color] from each wielded weapon
     [color=#c0c0c0]+5% chance to block[/color]
     
On [color=#ffff50]block[/color]: 

      perform a number of 50 damage [color=#ff8030]Hits[/color] against an adjacent enemy

[color=#a0a0a0]Number of hits = skill level

This hit bypasses all defense and uses your Main-hand damage type[/color]

Heartseeker.title: Heartseeker
Heartseeker.Name: [color=#af8f50]Heartseeker[/color]
Heartseeker.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] 100 or more [color=#af8f50]Pierce[/color] damage:

     apply [color=#ff1010]Bleed[/color] a number of times to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Bleed applications = Level

Bleed deals (4% of Max Life) Blood damage every turn for 3 turns[/color]

Assassin.title: Assassin
Assassin.Name: [color=#af8f50]Agility[/color]
Assassin.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]:

     [color=#50ffff]+50 Dodge[/color]
     [color=#ff8030]+50 Hit[/color] [color=#a0a0a0]if total Weapon Size is less than 5[/color]
     [color=#af8f50]+100% Pierce[/color] damage against targets with over 75% [color=#ff8080]Life[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]dodge[/color]:

     perform a number of [color=#ff8030]extra attacks[/color] against an adjacent enemy

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks = skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks use your Main-hand weapon and do not count as an "initial attack"[/color]

Aim.title: Aim
Aim.Name: [color=#af8f50]Aim[/color]
Aim.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]:

     [color=#ffa050]+100 Accuracy[/color]

On [color=#ff8030]attack[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] attack range [color=#ffff50]greater than 1[/color]:

     deal [color=#af8f50]Pierce[/color] damage to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 10% of Main-hand Hit * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ff8030]hit[/color]:

     apply [color=#ffaf50]Mark[/color] to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Mark applied = skill level[/color]

RapidStrikes.title: RapidStrikes
RapidStrikes.Name: [color=#af8f50]Pugilism[/color]
RapidStrikes.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] Main-hand is a [color=#ffff50]bare fist[/color]:

     [color=#ff8030]+20 Hit[/color]
     [color=#50ffff]+20 Dodge[/color]

On [color=#ff8030]attack[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] [color=#ffff50]bare fist[/color]:

      perform a number of 20 damage [color=#ff8030]Hits[/color] against the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Number of hits = skill level

This hit bypasses all defense and uses your Main-hand damage type[/color]

WarChant2.title: WarChant2
WarChant2.Name: [color=#af8f50]War Chant[/color]
WarChant2.Description:
On [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color], per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 
   
     apply 5 [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] to yourself
     perform a [color=#ff8030]Hit[/color] against 1 enemy in a 2 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Hit damage = 25% of your Main hand Hit

This hit bypasses all defense and uses your Main-hand damage type[/color]

Rampage.title: Rampage
Rampage.Name: [color=#af8f50]Bheith Nocht[/color]
Rampage.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color], per [color=#ffff50]empty armor slot[/color]:
   
     [color=#ff8030]+10% Hit[/color] [color=#707070]scales off equipped weapons[/color]
     [color=#5050ff]+50 Armor[/color]
     [color=#ff0000]+1 Encumbrance[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]being hit[/color]: 

     perform a number of [color=#ff8030]extra attacks[/color] against an adjacent enemy

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks = skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks use your Main-hand weapon and do not count as an "initial attack"[/color]

Might.title: Might
Might.Name: [color=#af8f50]Might[/color]
Might.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     [color=#ff8030]+100 Hit[/color]

On [color=#ff8030]adjacent attack[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] [color=#ffff50]two-handing[/color]:

     deal [color=#ffff50]damage[/color] to adjacent units

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = Main-hand damage type, 10% of Main-hand Hit * skill level[/color]

StandGround.title: StandGround
StandGround.Name: [color=#af8f50]Stand Ground[/color]
StandGround.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color]: 

     perform a number of [color=#ff8030]extra attacks[/color] against an adjacent enemy
     apply [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks = skill level

Poise applied = 10 * skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks use your Main-hand weapon and do not count as an "initial attack"[/color]

Kendo.title: Kendo
Kendo.Name: [color=#af8f50]Technique[/color]
Kendo.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     [color=#20ff20]+3 Speed[/color]
     [color=#50ff50]-1[/color] [color=#ff0000]Inflexibility[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]step[/color] / [color=#ff8030]initial attack[/color]:

     perform a number of [color=#ff8030]extra attacks[/color] against an adjacent enemy

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks = skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks use your Main-hand weapon and do not count as an "initial attack"[/color]

WarChant.title: WarChant
WarChant.Name: [color=#af8f50]Warlord[/color]
WarChant.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]summon[/color]:

     apply [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Poise applied = 2 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#af8f50]Thralls[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Amount summoned = 2 * skill level

Thralls are honor-bound axefighters

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

Dervish.title: Dervish
Dervish.Name: [color=#af8f50]Blademaster[/color]
Dervish.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]level[/color]:  

     [color=#ffa050]+20 Accuracy[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]initial attack[/color], [color=#ff8080]if[/color] [color=#af8f50]Slash[/color] weapon:

     perform a number of [color=#ff8030]extra attacks[/color] against the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Extra attacks = Level[/color]

Icewalking.title: Icewalking
Icewalking.Name: [color=#5080ff]Icewalking[/color]
Icewalking.Description:
[color=#5080ff]{Ice}[/color]

Whenever you [color=#ffff50]take a step[/color] or [color=#ffff50]teleport[/color], deal [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] damage to all adjacent units

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = (50 * (WIL/5) * Level) / Inflex[/color]

Inuk.title: Inuk
Inuk.Name: [color=#5080ff]Cryokinesis[/color]
Inuk.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]hit[/color]: 

     deal [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] damage to 2 adjacent enemies
     apply 5 [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color] to the target

On [color=#ffff50]apply[/color] [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color]: 

     deal [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] damage to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 35 * skill level[/color]

Cryomancy.title: Cryomancy
Cryomancy.Name: [color=#5080ff]Cryomancy[/color]
Cryomancy.Description:
On [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color] / [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color], per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]:

     apply 5 [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color] to 2 enemies in a 3 tile range

Increase all [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] / [color=#af8f50]Physical[/color] damage by the stacks of [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color] on the target [color=#707070]* skill level[/color]

Isaz.title: Isaz
Isaz.Name: [color=#5080ff]Isaz[/color]
Isaz.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     [color=#5050ff]+50 Block[/color]
     [color=#c0c0c0]+5% chance to block[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#af8f50]Pierce[/color] / [color=#af8f50]Blunt[/color] damage: 

     deal [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] damage to 1 enemy in a 2 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 100 * skill level[/color]

AuroraChant.title: AuroraChant
AuroraChant.Name: [color=#5080ff]Aurora Chant[/color]
AuroraChant.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] / [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] enemies live:

     deal 25 [color=#8030af]Astral[/color] damage to yourself
     [color=#707070]if you have Meditate:[/color]
     deal [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] damage to the closest enemy [color=#707070]repeat per skill level[/color]
     apply [color=#8030af]Meditate[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Meditate applied = skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 5 * stacks of Meditate on self[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Self-damage is unaffected by all resistance / increase[/color]

Frostpulse.title: Frostpulse
Frostpulse.Name: [color=#5080ff]Frostpulse[/color]
Frostpulse.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     [color=#ff0000]+5 Encumbrance[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] / [color=#78bca4]divine intervention[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] enemies live:

     deal [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] damage to all units in a 1+ tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 5 * Total Encumbrance * skill level

Range = skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Divine intervention occurs when your deity saves you from death; must have at least one fully-charged prayer[/color]

SikuApak.title: SikuApak
SikuApak.Name: [color=#5080ff]Obedient Ice[/color]
SikuApak.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color]: 

     apply [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color] to 2 enemies in a 3 tile range

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] / [color=#af8f50]Physical[/color] damage:

     increase it by the stacks of [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color] on the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Freeze applied = 5 * skill level[/color]

Arjuta.title: Arjuta
Arjuta.Name: [color=#5080ff]Frost Armor[/color]
Arjuta.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     [color=#5050ff]+100 Armor[/color]
     [color=#ff0000]+1 Inflexibility[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]shrug off[/color] / [color=#ffff50]block[/color]: 

     apply [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color] to the attacker

[color=#a0a0a0]Freeze applied = 3 * skill level[/color]

Parafrost.title: Parafrost
Parafrost.Name: [color=#5080ff]Master Freeze[/color]
Parafrost.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] enemies live:

     apply [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color] to yourself
     deal [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] damage to all enemies with [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Freeze applied = 3 * skill level

Damage =  stacks of Freeze on self * stacks of Freeze on the target[/color]

Gain [color=#5050ff]+2 Armor[/color] per stack of [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color] on self

You [color=#ffff50]no longer take damage[/color] from any source triggered by [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color] and it is no longer removed with [color=#c050ff]Willpower[/color]

SummonGrika.title: SummonGrika
SummonGrika.Name: [color=#5080ff]Ice Familiar[/color]
SummonGrika.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     summon a [color=#5080ff]Grika[/color] [color=#c050ff]familiar[/color]
     [color=#707070]Life / Hit multiplied by skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]The Grika is a large-shelled beast that pummels enemies

Summoned Familiars are not limited by your Willpower[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]apply[/color] [color=#5080ff]Freeze[/color] / [color=#dfaf50]Poise[/color]:

     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] the [color=#5080ff]Grika[/color] for 10 [color=#707070]* skill level[/color]
     the [color=#5080ff]Grika[/color] gains [color=#ff8030]+10 Hit[/color] [color=#707070]* skill level[/color]
     a random ally gains [color=#5050ff]+30 Armor[/color] [color=#707070]* skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]stand still[/color], per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]:

     the [color=#5080ff]Grika[/color] performs an [color=#ff8030]extra attack[/color] [color=#707070]against an enemy adjacent to it[/color]

Geistform.title: Geistform
Geistform.Name: [color=#FFC0CB]Crystalform[/color]
Geistform.Description:
On [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color]:  

     apply [color=#FFC0CB]Crystalform[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Crystalform applied = 5 * skill level

When applied, this effect replaces and inherits the stacks of any current transformation[/color]

IceKnight.title: IceKnight
IceKnight.Name: [color=#5080ff]Order of Ice[/color]
IceKnight.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]level[/color], to [color=#ffff50]summoned allies[/color]:

     [color=#ffff50]+25%[/color] [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] resistance

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#5080ff]Ice Knights[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = 2 * Level

Ice Knights are defensive warriors from the domain of ice. They heal and gain Hit when you are attacked.[/color]

MavetKa.title: MavetKa
MavetKa.Name: [color=#a0a000]Necrokinesis[/color]
MavetKa.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]hit[/color]: 

     deal [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage to the target

On [color=#50ff50]being healed[/color]: 

     deal [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage to the closest enemy

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 35 * skill level[/color]

Rabbah.title: Rabbah
Rabbah.Name: [color=#a0a000]Cursed Flesh[/color]
Rabbah.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]enemy death[/color]: 

     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] yourself
     deal [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage to two adjacent enemies

[color=#a0a0a0]Heal = 10 * skill level

Damage = 50 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage:

     apply [color=#a0a000]Doom[/color] to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Doom applied = skill level[/color]

Kuga.title: Kuga
Kuga.Name: [color=#a0a000]Kuga[/color]
Kuga.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     [color=#ff8080]+50 max Life[/color]

On [color=#ff8030]attack[/color] / [color=#ffff50]kill[/color]: 
     
     apply [color=#80af00]Plague[/color] to 1 enemy in a 3 tile range

On [color=#78bca4]divine intervention[/color]:

     perform this effect 6 times

[color=#a0a0a0]Plague applied = 3 * skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Divine intervention occurs when your deity saves you from death; must have at least one fully-charged prayer[/color]

MasterDoom.title: MasterDoom
MasterDoom.Name: [color=#a0a000]Master Doom[/color]
MasterDoom.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]ally[/color] / [color=#ffff50]enemy death[/color]:

     apply [color=#a0a000]Doom[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Doom applied = 10 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]being attacked by an adjacent unit[/color]:

     deal [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage to the attacker

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = skill level * stacks of Doom on self[/color]

You [color=#ffff50]no longer take damage[/color] from any source triggered by [color=#a0a000]Doom[/color] and it is no longer removed with [color=#c050ff]Willpower[/color]

Gain [color=#5050ff]+2 Armor[/color] per stack of [color=#a0a000]Doom[/color] on self

ChannelDeath.title: ChannelDeath
ChannelDeath.Name: [color=#a0a000]Grave Chant[/color]
ChannelDeath.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] / [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] enemies live: 

     deal 25 [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] damage to yourself
     deal [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage to all units in a 1+ tile range
     repeat with [color=#5080ff]Ice[/color] damage

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 100 * skill level

Range = skill level

Self-damage is unaffected by all resistance / increase[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]kill[/color] of a non-[color=#a0a000]Cadaver[/color]: 

     summon a [color=#a0a000]Cadaver[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Cadavers are naked undead that deal vile death damage

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

Necromancy.title: Necromancy
Necromancy.Name: [color=#a0a000]Necromancy[/color]
Necromancy.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]an ally attacking an enemy[/color]: 

     you deal [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage to the target

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 5 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#a0a000]Skeleton Warriors[/color] and [color=#a0a000]Skeleton Archers[/color]

On [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#a0a000]Cadavers[/color]
     allied [color=#a0a000]Undead[/color] gain [color=#20ff20]+5 Speed[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Skeleton Warriors are armored undead that fight with curved slashing blades. Skeleton Archers and Cadavers deal vile death damage

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

HungryGrave.title: HungryGrave
HungryGrave.Name: [color=#a0a000]Dread Legion[/color]
HungryGrave.Description:
Allied [color=#c050ff]familiars[/color] are now treated as [color=#a0a000]Undead[/color] [color=#707070]when summoned[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]ally or enemy death[/color]: 

     a random allied [color=#a0a000]Undead[/color] gains [color=#ff8030]+100 Hit[/color] [color=#707070]* skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#a0a000]Honored Dead[/color] [color=#c050ff]familiars[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = skill level

Honored Dead are heavily-armored undead that fight with cursed lances[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned Familiars are not limited by your Willpower[/color]

BlightCult.title: BlightCult
BlightCult.Name: [color=#a0a000]Blight Cult[/color]
BlightCult.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]ally death[/color]: 

     deal [color=#a0a000]Death[/color] damage in a path to 1 enemy in a 4 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 50 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#a0a000]Blight Priests[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = 3 * skill level

Blight Priests are loyal acolytes of your personal cult that attack with ranged Death

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

Batform.title: Batform
Batform.Name: [color=#a0a000]Batform[/color]
Batform.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]self-damage[/color]: 

     apply [color=#a0a000]Batform[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Batform applied = 2 * skill level

When applied, this effect replaces and inherits the stacks of any current transformation[/color]

Hemokinesis.title: Hemokinesis
Hemokinesis.Name: [color=#ff1010]Hemokinesis[/color]
Hemokinesis.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]hit[/color]: 

     apply 5 [color=#ff1010]Bleed[/color] to the target

On [color=#ffff50]apply[/color] [color=#ff1010]Bleed[/color]: 

     deal [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] damage in a path to 2 enemies in a 4 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 30 * skill level[/color]

GoreCleave.title: GoreCleave
GoreCleave.Name: [color=#ff1010]Gore Cleave[/color]
GoreCleave.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]: 

     [color=#ff8030]+50 Hit[/color]
     [color=#20ff20]+2 Speed[/color]

On [color=#ff8030]attack[/color]: 

     deal 15 [color=#af8f50]Slash[/color] damage to yourself
     deal [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] damage to adjacent units

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 100 * skill level

Self-damage is unaffected by resistance / increase[/color]

BloodRetort.title: BloodRetort
BloodRetort.Name: [color=#ff1010]Gore Chant[/color]
BloodRetort.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] / [color=#78bca4]prayer[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] enemies live:

     deal 25 [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] damage to yourself
     summon a number of [color=#ff2020]Bleeding Dead[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Summoned amount = skill level

Bleeding Dead are undead servants that attack with blood

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Self-damage is unaffected by resistance / increase[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]being dealt[/color] damage: 

     deal [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] damage in a path to 1 enemy in a 4 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Retort damage = 50 * skill level[/color]

UnstableThirst.title: UnstableThirst
UnstableThirst.Name: [color=#ff1010]Roil[/color]
UnstableThirst.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]hit[/color]: 

     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] yourself
     apply [color=#ff8000]Inflame[/color] to yourself
     deal 15 [color=#ff7000]Fire[/color] damage to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Heal = 5 * skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Inflame applied = 2 * skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Self-damage is unaffected by resistance / increase[/color]

Bloodbath.title: Bloodbath
Bloodbath.Name: [color=#ff1010]Bloodbath[/color]
Bloodbath.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]dealing[/color] [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] damage to an [color=#ffff50]adjacent unit[/color]: 

     [color=#50ff50]heal[/color] yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Heal = 5 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]being dealt[/color] [color=#af8f50]Physical[/color] damage: 

     deal [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] damage to adjacent units

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 75 * skill level

"Physical" damage is Pierce, Slash or Blunt[/color]

GoreTide.title: GoreTide
GoreTide.Name: [color=#ff1010]Gore Tide[/color]
GoreTide.Description:
Per [color=#ffff50]skill level[/color]:  

     [color=#ff8080]+50 max Life[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] / [color=#78bca4]divine intervention[/color], [color=#ff5050]if[/color] enemies live: 

     deal [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] damage to all units in a 3 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = skill level * missing Life[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Divine intervention occurs when your deity saves you from death; must have at least one fully-charged prayer[/color]

MasterBleed.title: MasterBleed
MasterBleed.Name: [color=#ff1010]Master Bleed[/color]
MasterBleed.Description:
On [color=#ff8030]attack[/color]: 

     apply [color=#ff1010]Bleed[/color] to yourself

[color=#a0a0a0]Bleed applied = 5 * skill level[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]being dealt damage by an enemy[/color]: 

     deal [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] damage in a path to the damaging unit

[color=#a0a0a0]Damage = 5 * skill level * stacks of Bleed on self[/color]

You [color=#ffff50]no longer take damage[/color] from any source triggered by [color=#ff1010]Bleed[/color] and it is no longer removed with [color=#c050ff]Willpower[/color]

MinionFeast.title: MinionFeast
MinionFeast.Name: [color=#ff1010]Gore Cult[/color]
MinionFeast.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]summon[/color]: 

     deal 15 [color=#ff1010]Blood[/color] damage to yourself
     apply [color=#ff1010]Bleed[/color] to 1 enemy in a 4 tile range

[color=#a0a0a0]Bleed applied = 10 * skill level

Self-damage is unaffected by resistance / increase[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color]: 

     summon a number of [color=#ff1010]Gore Priests[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]Amount summoned = 3 * skill level

Gore Priests are loyal acolytes of your personal cult that attack with ranged blood damage

Total summons limited by your Willpower[/color]

Bloodcalling.title: Bloodcalling
Bloodcalling.Name: [color=#ff1010]Blood Familiar[/color]
Bloodcalling.Description:
On [color=#ffff50]entrance[/color] / [color=#ffff50]learn[/color] / [color=#78bca4]divine intervention[/color]: 

     summon a [color=#ff1010]Hemogoblin[/color] [color=#c050ff]familiar[/color]
     [color=#707070]Life / Hit multiplied by skill level[/color]

[color=#a0a0a0]The Hemogoblin is a frenzied blood-projection that rends enemies

Summoned Familiars are not limited by your Willpower[/color]

On [color=#ffff50]self-damage[/color] / [color=#ffff50]apply[/color] [color=#ff1010]Bleed[/color]:

     a random ally gains [color=#20ff20]+1 Speed[/color] [color=#707070]* skill level[/color]
     the [color=#ff1010]Hemogoblin[/color] gains [color=#ff8030]+20 Hit[/color] [color=#707070]* skill level[/color]
